name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free DA PA Checker Bulk - Chrome Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily check Domain Authority (DA) and Page Authority (PA) for up to 10 domains at once. Quick SEO insights from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the ultimate SEO tool to boost your website's performance! With the Free DA PA Checker Bulk, you can effortlessly check the following metrics for up to 10 domains at a time:

➔ DA (Domain Authority): Measure the authority of any domain and evaluate its SEO strength.
➔ Spam Score: Identify the spam risk of a domain and make informed decisions.
➔ External Pages: Get insights into the number of external pages linking to a domain.
➔ Redirect Pages: Analyze the number of redirected pages for better site optimization.
➔ Root Domains: Check how many unique domains are linking to the site.
➔ Page Rank: Assess the ranking power of individual pages.

Whether you're an SEO expert, digital marketer, or a website owner, this extension gives you the tools you need to optimize your SEO strategy right from your browser.

Key Features:

➔ Bulk check up to 10 domains at once for quick and easy analysis.
➔ User-friendly interface designed for speed and accuracy.
➔ Fetch metrics directly from reliable data sources.
➔ Lightweight and fast – no unnecessary permissions or features.

Why Choose Free DA PA Checker Bulk?
Our extension saves you time and effort by providing detailed SEO insights at your fingertips. Easily evaluate website authority, analyze competitors, and improve your digital presence—all without leaving your browser.

How to Use:

➔ Install the extension and open it from your browser toolbar.
➔ Enter up to 10 domains in the input box.
➔ Click “Fetch Metrics” to get instant results.
➔ View all essential metrics in a clean and organized table.

Who Should Use This Extension?

➔ SEO professionals analyzing domain metrics.
➔ Digital marketers optimizing strategies.
➔ Website owners evaluating their site's SEO performance.
➔ Bloggers and content creators monitoring competitor performance.

Start using the Free DA PA Checker Bulk - Chrome Extension today and take your SEO analysis to the next level!
